Reference

Package

fma package

fma-package fma

Data sets from "Forecasting: methods and applications" by Makridakis, Wheelwright and Hyndman (1998)

Super-Annual Data

Data recorded at intervals greater than one year

olympic

Men's 400 m final winning times in each Olympic Games

Annual Data

Data recorded every year

bicoal

Annual bituminous coal production

chicken

Price of chicken

Copper prices

Copper prices

copper

Copper price

eggs

Price of eggs

elco

Sales of Elco's laser printers

ibm

IBM sales and profit

huron

Level of Lake Huron

jcars

Motor vehicle production

lynx

Annual Canadian Lynx trappings 1821--1934

mink

Number of minks trapped

Nail prices

Oil prices

pcv

GDP

sheep

Sheep population

strikes

Number of strikes

telephone

Telephone cost

wagesuk

Real daily wages

wheat

Wheat prices

Data recorded every quarter

Quarterly clay brick production

canadian

Canadian unemployment rate

capital

Quarterly capital expenditure and appropriations

Consumer price index

Electricity production

qsales

Sales data

Data recorded every month
